title: [Gameplay]-[Sound] LeBlanc Casting Ability Sound
body:
So I don't know if it is just me, but {{champion:7}} LeBlanc is not saying her lines for casting her spells (Sigil of Malice, Distortion, Ethereal Chains) all of them. All of my sound options are up, but my music is muted. 

It's only the abilities themselves that play the sound without her voice.

Also I keep hearing the same movement quotes that I feel that her other quotes are not playing as well.


Could you guys look into this? 

Edit: I tested it in custom with all of my sounds up and it is definitely not working for classic LeBlanc

Edit: I tested it again, but with Ravenborn LeBlanc and it is still not playing.

replies.body: It definitely is to me, too. I like her "watch closely", "there is no  escape" and her "heyah!" sound. I feel less concentrated without it

OH Yeah I noticed htat too.

I actually reported this to Riot support but they had no idea why this happens as well.

1. Her voices when attack are not coming

2. Her clone's death sound isn't coming
It's not something major, but for me, it's really bothersome. I hope they could fix this.

> [{quoted}](name=SylvanasWrunner,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=hQui1Qwr,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-06-26T20:18:08.991+0000)
>
> It's not something major, but for me, it's really bothersome. I hope they could fix this.

Do you have other skins? Did they have troubles too? 

According to my support ticket, they looked into this and they said it worked fine in other computers...hm

Maybe you shuold submit a ticket
I have all LeBlanc skins, but like I said my major concern is her voice lines for casting abilities. I think for quotes, mine is actually working properly.
holy crap, thats whats missing, yeah Ive noticed this, I like it when she say (theres no escape) or (surprise to see me)

For playing LeBlanc for years, I can tell that yes, something is off with her sounds and I was like she is missing some lines. I'm more bothered with her missing casting ability sounds though like saying ''HEEYAH!'' with Distortion and with her other spells :3

I noticed that too..... over a year ago. Forgot to report it tho.
Glad Riot does something about it now.

As far as IÂ´m aware, many champs and skins suffer from the same issue.
@RIOT KATEYKHAOS pls tell the team to cut the Blackfrost Anivia taunt sounds. You have to wait 3 Seconds after a taunt to start a new one. I assume long silence at the end of each line.
Example: Piltover Costums Blitzcrank. His special Horn sound which should play when activating his "W" barely plays at all.
Thanks for the report! We're looking into it. :)
Thanks for the bug report! I've gone ahead and passed this on to the team handling this. It appears to be affecting both the base champion, as well as all skins.
